original: ra ti pra ye s'a dha n'a ma /
analyzed: ra ti pra ye s'a dha n'a ma /

original: dga' bas tshim ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dga' bas tshim ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /

original: aom ra ti pri ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ra ti pri ye sv'a h'a /

original: zhes so // gro ga'am ras la gnod spyin mo dga' bas tshim ma zhes bya ba sku mdo gser mo gzhon nu'i gzugs can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: zhes so // gro ga'am ras la gnod spyin mo dga' bas tshim ma zhes bya ba sku mdo gser mo gzhon nu'i gzugs can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: On birch bark or cloth, one should draw the yakṣiṇī Ratiprayāsarasā, golden-colored, youthful in form, adorned with all ornaments,

original: me tog autpala bzung ba gong bzhin du bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: me tog autpala bzung ba gong bzhin du bri bar bya ste /
translated: holding an utpala flower, as before.

original: sna ma'i me tog gis yang dag par mchod cing gu gul gyis bdug ste /
analyzed: sna ma'i me tog gis yang dag par mchod cing gu gul gyis bdug ste /
translated: One should make offerings with jasmine flowers, and burn agalloch incense.

original: zla ba gcig gi bar du nyi ma re re la sngags stong phrag re re bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba gcig gi bar du nyi ma re re la sngags stong phrag re re bzla bar bya'o //
translated: For one month, one should recite the mantra one thousand times each day.

original: de nas ji ltar nus pas mchod pa bya ste mar gyi mar me byas la /
analyzed: de nas ji ltar nus pas mchod pa bya ste mar gyi mar me byas la /
translated: Then, one should make offerings according to one's ability, and offer butter lamps.

original: de ji srid ma byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de ji srid ma byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should recite until she appears.

original: byung ba dang ngag bcad de 'dod pa spyad na bud med du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byung ba dang ngag bcad de 'dod pa spyad na bud med du 'gyur ro //
translated: When she appears, one should keep silent and enjoy her as one wishes. She will become a woman.

original: sgrub pa po'i 'khor rnams kyang rab tu skyong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i 'khor rnams kyang rab tu skyong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The practitioner's retinue will also be well cared for.

original: lha'i 'dod yon lnga'i bza' ba dang dngul chu dang / bcud len 'dis nor nyi shu rtsa lnga ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha'i 'dod yon lnga'i bza' ba dang dngul chu dang / bcud len 'dis nor nyi shu rtsa lnga ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This elixir of the five divine sense objects, mercury, and alchemical potion will bestow the twenty-five riches.

original: dga' bas tshim ma zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dga' bas tshim ma zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs so//
translated: The Tantra of the Satisfied Dakini is complete.
